com.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.ui.dialogs.card

Class ImageFileChooserObservable

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.ui.dialogs.card.ImageFileChooserObservable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class ImageFileChooserObservable
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    This class wraps a JFileChooser object in order to provide the functionality to select images files with extension .jpg, .jpeg and .png. It extends class Observable in order to notify observers, once a file has been selected.
    Author:
    Sebastian Dine

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ImageFileChooserObservable(CardBean cardBean, ImageEnum imgType) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
      When a proper image file has been selected, CardBeanImageServices.uploadImageFile(CardBean, java.io.File, ImageEnum) will be called in order to store the image file to the file system and maintain the corresponding CardBean object.
      void showDialog()
      This method displays the file chooser dialog.

      • Methods inherited from class java.util.Observable

        addObserver, countObservers, deleteObserver, deleteObservers, hasChanged, notifyObservers, notifyObservers

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImageFileChooserObservable

        public ImageFileChooserObservable(CardBean cardBean,
                                  ImageEnum imgType)
        Parameters:
        cardBean - CardBean object, to which the selected image should be attached.
        imgType - Image type of the selected object. Use ImageEnum.IMG_FRONT for front images and ImageEnum.IMG_BACK for images of the back of the card(s).

    • Method Detail

      • showDialog

        public void showDialog()
        This method displays the file chooser dialog.

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        When a proper image file has been selected, CardBeanImageServices.uploadImageFile(CardBean, java.io.File, ImageEnum) will be called in order to store the image file to the file system and maintain the corresponding CardBean object. Furthermore, all observers will be notified, that a selection has been made.
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
